osint_sources.name: Social Media Analysis
osint_sources.description: Monitoring and analysis of social media platforms for potential threats or intelligence gathering.

osint_sources.name: Public Records
osint_sources.description: Access to public records and databases for background checks and information verification.
tools: Public Access to Court Electronic Records

osint_sources.name: Domain and IP Analysis
osint_sources.description: Investigation of domain names and IP addresses to track ownership and associated activities.

osint_sources.name: Cyber Threat Databases
osint_sources.description: Utilization of databases that collect and share information about cyber threats and incidents.

osint_sources.name: Geospatial Analysis
osint_sources.description: Use of mapping and location data to identify patterns and connections between events and entities.

osint_sources.name: Deep and Dark Web Monitoring
osint_sources.description: Exploration of the parts of the internet not indexed by traditional search engines for threat intelligence.

osint_sources.name: Technical Data and Logs
osint_sources.description: Analysis of technical logs and data for signs of malicious activity or security breaches.
